key.name: autostart
key.summary: Autostart overlay service on extension enable
key.description: If true, extension enable() starts my-overlay.service.

key.name: stop-on-disable
key.summary: Stop overlay service on extension disable
key.description: If true, extension disable() stops my-overlay.service.

key.name: text
key.description: Reserved key for future direct text syncing from extension to overlay app.

key.name: config-path
key.description: Reserved key for future integration. Current MVP uses overlay-app/config.json via systemd service.

key.name: overlay-script-path
key.description: Reserved key for future integration. Current MVP starts overlay via systemd unit.
